Package ss.server

Class CollectoServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ss.server.CollectoServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, ServerProtocol
    public class CollectoServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, ServerProtocol
    Server TUI for Networked Collecto Application. Intended Functionality: interactively set up & monitor a new server

      • CollectoServer

        public CollectoServer()

    • Method Detail

      • main

      • getServerName

        public java.lang.String getServerName()
        Returns the name of the Collecto server.
        Returns:
        the name of the Collecto server.

      • run

        public void run()
        Opens a new socket by calling setup() and starts a new AbaloneClientHandler for every connecting client. If setup() throws a ExitProgram exception, stop the program. In case of any other errors, ask the user whether the setup should be ran again to open a new socket.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • setup

        public void setup()
           throws ExitProgram,
                  java.net.UnknownHostException
        Sets up a new Collecto using and opens a new ServerSocket at localhost on a user-defined port. The user is asked to input a port, after which a socket is attempted to be opened. If the attempt succeeds, the method ends, If the attempt fails, the user decides to try again, after which an ExitProgram exception is thrown or a new port is entered.
        Throws:
        ExitProgram - if a connection can not be created on the given port and the user decides to exit the program.
        java.net.UnknownHostException

      • removeClient

        public void removeClient​(CollectoClientHandler client)
        Removes a clientHandler from the client list.

      • doMove

        public void doMove​(java.lang.String gameName,
                   java.lang.String[] move,
                   CollectoClientHandler handler)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Executes the move function of the board on the server for a given game(by name), move and handler of the player doing the move.
        Specified by:
        doMove in interface ServerProtocol
        Parameters:
        gameName - name of the game to perform the move on
        move - the move to be performed
        handler - the handler for the client of the player doing the move

        java.io.IOException

      • doGameOver

        public void doGameOver​(CollectoClientHandler handler)
        Called when a game is over. Sends the message to the client given through the handler.
        Specified by:
        doGameOver in interface ServerProtocol
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler for the user

      • doNewGame

        public void doNewGame​(java.lang.String userName,
                      java.lang.String gameName,
                      int capacity,
                      CollectoClientHandler handler)
        Creates a game given a name, password and capacity for it. Then has the player that created it join the game.
        Specified by:
        doNewGame in interface ServerProtocol
        Parameters:
        userName - the name of the player creating it
        gameName - the name for the game
        capacity - the capacity for the game
        handler - the handler for the client calling it

      • doQUEUE

        public void doQUEUE​(java.lang.String gameName,
                    CollectoClientHandler handler)
        Called when a user indicates they are ready to start a game. Starts the game if all users are ready.
        Specified by:
        doQUEUE in interface ServerProtocol
        Parameters:
        gameName - name of the game the user is in
        handler - the handler for the user

      • doStart

        public void doStart​(CollectoClientHandler handler)
        Sends a NEWGAME message to user to indicate the game they are in has started.
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler for the user

        Parameters:
